## Current Position

Currently, I am **Ph.D. Student in Political Science** of the Graduate Research Group [Resilient Institutions](https://resilient.institutions.uni-mainz.de/) at the **University of Mainz**.

I receive a scholarship founded by the [**Gutenberg Council for Young Researchers**]
:::

In my dissertation project under the supervision of [Claudia Landwehr](https://theorie.politik.uni-mainz.de/univ-prof-dr-claudia-landwehr/), I examine **Episodes of democratic erosion -- sequences, opportunity structures, and patterns of autocratization** aiming to contribute to the debate on democratic resilience.
